snippet.title: Dreamland Prison - Trailer
snippet.description:
Dreamland Prison is an action RPG slasher game with dynamic combat. You play as Ares the young man who get's involved in demons game. Your main goal is to destroy Leviathan's strongest servant Archdemon, only by doing it you can save hundreds of people in white sleep.

Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/laughingfoxgames/dreamland-prison
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1624130/Dreamland_Prison
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gaming/LaughingFoxGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/laughing.fox.games?hl=en
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/@Laughing_fox_games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/laughingfoxgam1
